include(Einsums_Message)



# cmake-format: off
set(_Einsums_modules
  Assertion
  BLAS
  BLASBase
  BLASVendor
  Benchmark
  Concepts
  Config
  Debugging
  Decomposition
  Errors
  FFT
  GPUStreams
  HPTT
  ITTNotify
  Iterator
  LinearAlgebra
  Memory
  Preprocessor
  Print
  Profile
        Runtime
        RuntimeConfiguration
  StringUtil
  Tensor
  TensorAlgebra
  TensorBase
  TensorUtilities
  TypeSupport
  Utilities
)
#cmake-format: on

einsums_info("")
einsums_info("  Configuring Einsums modules:")
einsums_info("")

foreach(module ${_Einsums_modules})
  einsums_info("    ${module}")
  add_subdirectory(${module})
endforeach()
